EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Virtual Health Monitor Tool for National Health IT Week (Sept. 15-19)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
VMTurbo's FREE Virtual Health Monitor Deploys in 15 minutes & monitors up to 10,000 virtual machines
Download Now: <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweekvhm&utm_content=091614> {{lead.First Name:default=}}:
VMTurbo’s Virtual Health Monitor <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweekvhm&utm_content=091614> is a free monitoring & reporting tool for virtual environments. It provides single pane of glass visibility into VM and infrastructure health.
- Monitor Storage, Compute, & Network performance in single pane of glass - Flexible dashboards & reports: datacenters, clusters, hosts, data stores, VMs - Efficiency recommendations to maximize resources - Unlimited scale – no limitations on number of hosts or VMs - Easy deployment - up and running in less than 15 minutes
Get Free Tool <http://vmturbo.com/product/virtualization-monitoring-software/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweekvhm&utm_content=091614> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
